Brian’s mouth opened.

14.content:
Brian got dressed quickly and headed from his dorm room to the college gym. He had just started his first year at school, on an academic scholarship, but had a vision of being on the college rowing team as he had been on his high school team. He knew as he did not have an athletic scholarship he was not guaranteed a spot on the team, so he'd have to work hard to be in shape for the tryouts.

There were 3 main gyms at the college. The main gymnasium, which was the arena for the schools basketball games and gymnastics competitions - which was basically just a very large empty room with pull out bleachers and hardwood floors. The athletics department gym, which had a series of rowing machines, a practice gymnasium and a number of quality weight machines and free weights. And finally, the student gym - which had decent equipment, much of which had once been in the athletics gym but had been replaced there and moved here - it also had treadmills, cycles and a short jogging track around the outside. It was this third gym that Brian entered as he did not have access to the athletics department gym until he made it onto one of the teams. He had arrived early enough that there were still a couple of rowing machines open when he finished his warm up, and he took a spot on one and began a workout - but not a focused one.

His mind wandered as he looked around the room at all the different women working out - there was a smorgasbord of female flesh in the gym. A couple of blond model types were on the treadmills gossiping about a third girl who was on the cycles - a heavy set girl who was still suffering with that dreaded high school social killer, acne. The models felt she was an excellent subject for their ridicule and as they commented about her weight and how she should be horrified to be seen in public, they made sure they did so loudly enough that she would overhear.. A couple of her friends - both reasonably attractive - were exercising with her and encouraging her to pay no attention. A couple of gym rats were using some of the lighter free weights as an excuse to scope out the guys in the gym and decide if this would be their hunting ground for the in shape guys they exclusively dated, or if they'd have to switch to one of the gyms in the nearby town. They were both fairly fit, but obviously not athletes. There was a girl on one of the other rowing machines, tall and probably with better fitness than Brian himself - most likely already on the rowing team here to scope out new talent for the women's program. She was rowing beside a guy, possibly her boyfriend, but also likely doing the same thing for the men's rowing program. The guy was also a bit overly competitive with the girl, jibing her about his superior rowing ability.

A lone jogger was doing circuits on the track, her slightly muscular legs pumping rhythmically - sweating thighs and calves being shown off excellently by her very short shorts. There were several other guys in the gym as well, of course, but none of them seemed particularly relevant to Brian at the moment. He then remembered the strange dream and decided to try out this supposed power here in the gym.

Brian continued to stare at the jogger as she moved passed, admiring her firm defined calves as they bulged out when she pressed her toes to the track before pushing off. Her thighs were sleek and just barely defined. Her upper body was a typical runner’s build, narrow and underdeveloped compared to the lower half. She was wearing a runner’s top that was narrow across her flat chest and exposed her thin arms and flat, non-descript stomach. She was very pretty with her narrow chin, high cheek bones and long blonde hair tied into a pony tail that bobbed back and forth as she ran.

Brian began to imagine her with larger muscles across the same, thin frame. He thought about her becoming faster, stronger, more athletic. He fantasized her being the best female athlete in school. And then the best athlete in the school, man or woman. And then the best athlete in the world! Sniffing to himself, his mind settled on the most powerful athlete the world had ever seen. And then to his surprise a voice inside his head said “granted”. Looking around, Brian jerked at the voice and looking around, found that there was nobody nearby. He then looked back at the girl running around the indoor track and his eyes grew wide.

The girl, Kristen, was a freshman on the cross country team, competing for a spot. She was good, but wanted to be good enough to make the traveling team. So she figured to get some extra miles in when she could. The indoor track was sufficient for a bit of speed work and she was doing intervals. It just so happened that when she was starting to speed up for a hard lap that Brian’s wish was granted. Her mind already prepared to increase her effort; she was ill prepared for the adrenaline rush she experienced. Her arms, often held too high and near her chest, remained low and began pumping vigorously. Her shoulders often lowered as she tired, moved higher. Her chest and mid-section, often sunken as her core wasn’t strong enough to withstand the effort, surged forward with new, vigorous energy, strength and enhanced musculature. Within moments, Kristen was transforming from an average cross country runner to nothing more than a super athlete!

With her head held high, Kristen raised her knees as she accelerated around the track, picking up speed she had never had before. Her back widened with larger, stronger muscles, her legs added inch after inch of hyper powered muscle fibers. Her chest pressed her top forward with mounds of intimidating pectorals while her abs solidified into cut, hard blocks of perfect muscles, even adding more and more oblique muscles up her side. Half way around the track Kristen was still accelerating, moving toward a dead sprint that would surpass anyone on the track team, yet she felt she could go faster.

Those cute calves bunched into softball sized balls of rumbling muscles that continued to grow larger and more powerful. Her thighs expanded and separated into large slabs of cut muscle that would rival the star running back on the football team! Her hamstrings bulled forward and her glutes pushed out rounder, firmer and stronger than the world’s best 100 meter Olympic athletes. Her biceps bulged off her narrow arms like small boulders and triceps molded into scary horseshoe shapes five inches thick and growing.

By the time Kristen completed the lap she was running faster than any human had ever run before! She roared across the finish line and slowed down to a jog before stopping to take in what had just happened.

Her top was ripping up the sides against an onslaught of steel hard muscles pumped up to ridiculous proportions and she was felt that one hard inhale would destroy the stretchy material. But she didn’t seem to care all that much about that. What she felt was the incredible strength and power rippling though her body. Her height had remained at 5 foot 4, but her muscles would be the envy of any woman on campus and most of the men too! But even beyond that, her strength was still ramping up to greater heights than any man had ever reached! Kristen pulled up her right arm and flexed down, causing her Herculean muscles to surge upward on her arm like molten lava into a mountain of muscle 24 incredible inches around!

“What the heck has happened to me?”

Releasing her flex she looked around and spotted Brian staring on with an excited look on his face. Narrowing her eyes, Kristen walked over toward Brian who was frozen with wonder. Kristen reached him and looked down at Brian, who was still sitting on the rowing machine.

“Do you know what just happened to me?”

Brian almost fell out of the chair and struggled to stand up. Kristen watched him closely with her fists planted on her hips, looking intimidating, yet achingly sexy at the same time. She looked like a wet dream version of Supergirl, which Brian started thinking about. Brian cleared his throat and struggled to talk.

“Well, I, uh, maybe. Are you upset?”

Kristen’s face slowly moved from annoyance to a wry smile. “Well, no, not exactly. But what did you do? My body just built up more muscle than most men on campus like I was the Incredible Hulk or something. How did you do that?”

Brian gulped. His mind started gravitating toward She-Hulk and making her muscles even bigger. “I, um, I’m not really sure. I just thought about you becoming bigger and stronger and then it started happening.”

Kristen’s eyes lit up. “Just how strong?”

Brian tried not to start hyperventilating. “Stronger than anyone I think.”

Kristen’s excitement grew. “Really?”

She looked around and spotted a nearby empty squat machine with what looked like 400 pounds on it. Kristen sauntered over and knowing a few things about lifting weights, reached underneath, set the bar across her shoulders and lifted the bar off the rack, preparing to squat the weight. She stepped back, concentrating, then moved down smoothly and then back up quickly, her massive thighs booming outward with rippling mounds of muscle. Kristen smiled as she licked her lips.

“That was easy. I wonder what else I can do?”

As Brian looked on with wonder, Kristen set herself again and then with a girlish grunt pushed the bar up over her head. She brought it down to her pumped up chest and then back up with equal ease.

“Wow, you weren’t kidding, I’m really strong too.”

At this point Brian’s mind was churning. If he made her this strong, just how far could he go? Should he make her even stronger? Even more muscular? Maybe he could follow her into the other work out area and see what she can do there first. The football players in the other room working out and watching this girl outperform them would be exciting to watch. Heck, he could just improve her even more while she was working out just to see their expressions.

As Kristen knocked off a few more standing chest presses, Brian thought.

In truth, the changes to her face were fairly subtle, but enough to blow him away. Her lips were just a bit fuller, her cheekbones just a bit higher, her nose just a bit more....perfect. And her eyes... Originally, they had been a pale, almost sky blue. But now, they were deeper, clearer, and almost glowing with barely contained power.

"Holy God," Brian breathed out, barely noticing the voice in his head correcting him. "Goddess," Myridia said.

All the while, Kristen barely noticed the changes happening to her body, focusing on the weight in her hands. A weight that had seemingly vanished. Knitting her eyebrows in confusion, she looked down at the bar. It still looked the same. Yeah, 400 pounds. And yet, it felt like she was lifting a paperclip or something like that. Turning towards Brian, she slowly walked towards him, unconsciously swaying her hips in a sultry manner. She easily towered over him by at least four or five inches, the power radiating off her. After a long moment, a smile came to Kristen's full lips. Reaching up, she gently placed her seemingly delicate hands on his shoulders. "Thank you," she said softly, hands that could crush steel gently squeezing his shoulders. "This is...amazing. Thank you." Without waiting for a response, she bent down slightly, her lips meeting his in a tender kiss. It was brief, though there was a hint of promise, if the look in her eyes and the wry smile on her lips were any indication.

"Well," Kristen began, giving his shoulders another squeeze before taking a step back, "it looks like working out here would be a waste of time. I mean, I doubt any of these weights would give these guns much of a challenge." For emphasis, she raised her hand, flexing a perfectly round bicep that was larger than a softball. "Still, we could have a little fun here, or...we could go back to your place or mine." The last bit said coyly.

info.brief_description: 18-year old Brian is given the ability to enhance any and every woman around him.
info.description:
This is primarily and strength and FMG interactive story. I ask that you not make a woman over...7 feet tall, tops. There's no limit to how strong, muscular, powerful, beautiful, etc etc etc any woman can be. I only ask the following:

1. Brian can't be killed or permenantly harmed or in any other way, or in any shape or form, kept under someone else's power.
2. No underage sex, period. If you do, I'll edit or erase your chapter. Maybe...MAYBE if it's with an older teen (16 or 17 years old) I'll allow it.
3. No incest please. He can get 'hot' over a woman in his family that he enhances, but don't take it any further.
4. You don't have to make a woman stronger, or anything. She can just become more beautiful, or both, or anything else as long as a woman is being enhanced.

About Brian and his ability:

1. He can either be in High school, graduated from it, or just entering college, the choice is yours.
2. IF he enhances a woman, he enhances what she starts with, the effects are based on how the woman was to begin when he started improving her. If she gets 10 times stronger to start, then later on is 10 times stronger again, she'll be 100 times stronger than how she started in the first place.
3. He can enhance multiple women at once, but the more women he changes at once, the slower the changes. On the other end, if it's just one woman, she can change greatly very quickly.
4. The women will never totally hurt him. They can be dominant, but never overly abusive.
5. If a woman gets powerful enough, she can gain other abilities beyond beauty and strength.

Aside from anything mentioned, anything goes in the story, just try and stay with Brian. I do of course reserve the ability to change any chapters or add anything to these lists if I so choose. If you hav e any questions, feel free to send me a message.
